footer.brandDescription: A carefully curated collection full of elegant pieces for the modern woman ‚Äî yes, for you who want to look great even when you're short on time. We bring you styles that blend timeless classics with today‚Äôs trends, delivered right to your door so you don‚Äôt have to lift a finger. A bit of style, a bit of comfort, a bit of magic ‚Äî all ready to wear.
footer.paymentTitle: Safe Shopping Experience, Cash on Delivery
footer.paymentSubtitle: No need to enter sensitive information online. With Lorelei, you pay on delivery ‚Äî simply settle the payment when your order arrives.
footer.faq1Question: How can I place an order?
footer.faq1Answer: Simply browse our collection, select your desired items, and contact us directly through Instagram or the provided channels to complete your order.
footer.faq2Answer: Standard delivery typically takes 1-2 business days within Albania. You'll receive tracking information once your order is dispatched.
footer.faq3Question: Can I change or cancel my order?
footer.faq3Answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. Please contact us immediately for assistance.
footer.faq4Answer: Currently, we offer delivery exclusively within Albania. We're working to expand our shipping options in the near future.
footer.faq5Answer: Each product page includes detailed size guides. If you need personalized assistance, our team is happy to help you find the perfect fit.
footer.faq6Question: What payment methods do you accept?
footer.faq6Answer: Payment is made in cash upon delivery, ensuring a secure and straightforward transaction when you receive your order.
footer.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Lorelei Boutique ‚Äî where elegance meets excellence
